cufy.beans

Annotation Type Bean.Property


  • @Retention(value=RUNTIME)
 @Target(value=FIELD)
public static @interface Bean.Property
    Defines that the annotated field can be entry.

    • Optional Element Summary

      Optional Elements 
      Modifier and Type Optional Element and Description
      Where converter
      The reference to the converter to use when a value to be set with different type that the allowed.
      Recipe key
      The key of the annotated field.
      Type type
      The type of the annotated field.

    • Element Detail

      • converter

        public abstract Where converter
        The reference to the converter to use when a value to be set with different type that the allowed.
        Returns:
        the reference to the converter of the annotated field
        Default:
        @cufy.meta.Where(cufy.convert.BaseConverter.class)

      • key

        public abstract Recipe key
        The key of the annotated field. This will override the default key (the name of the field).
        Returns:
        the key of the annotated field
        Default:
        @cufy.meta.Recipe(converter=@cufy.meta.Where)

      • type

        public abstract Type type
        The type of the annotated field. This will override the default type (The type of the field)
        Returns:
        the type of the annotated field's property
        Default:
        @cufy.meta.Type(java.lang.Object.class)
